Get unique applications to fulfill your needs Your business solution needs a healthy dose of advancement. Prosper your ideas with some of our most robust solutions.

Our Advanced IT Technology for Sports Application Development Services

We count our success on a number of successful sports websites and applications across the world. We are a leading sports product service provider of application development, website development, digital marketing services, and Business Solutions. We are constantly bringing out superb sports app solutions since 2008 for various industry needs.

Sports and Utility App Development

We build feature-rich mobile applications for sports business and utilities. We can develop apps for athletes, sportspersons and customized sports gaming applications for you.

Sports Web Development

Any sports business can invest in website development to maintain its existence and attract the visitors. We can develop a responsive and functional website for sports. Our web developers are experienced and familiar with various web development technologies.

Augmented / Virtual Reality

Add some new exciting features of AR and VR to make your app loved by everyone. Gain new audience reach with this feature.

Cross-Platform App Development

We are experts in sports app development using some of the most commonly used cross-platform frameworks like PhoneGap, Sencha Touch, HTML5, Xamarin etc.

IoT Development

Analyzing the fitness of the body and workout via various sports applications is a new thing that athletes are fond of nowadays.

Blockchain Development

It is used to track millions of connected devices and manages the coordination between transactions in other devices.

Digital Marketing Services

We offer extreme class digital marketing services to improve your ranks and online visibility. Whether you are a startup or big enterprise, we can improve your search and mark you on top with our extraordinary SEO experts.

Wearable App Development

Wearable devices are useful for athletes as they can wear it and jog, run or do any physical workout and monitor their activities with the help of apps. We develop wearable applications for Android, iOS and Window platforms.

Native App Development Services

We provide top-notch native app development solutions and deliver best quality Android, iOS applications for for all kind of sports.

Upgradation & Maintenance Services

We provide maintenance services for apps and websites. Our technical team is active to handle queries and provide operational support to you.

Amazing Features to Develop Sports Management Software

The sports industry is economically strong and taking steps towards technology. We, The NineHertz are providing a wide range of Sports solutions like sports application and website development for various sports app related needs along with some out-of-the-box features.

Push Notification

If something new happens in your app or any new update arrives, the app will notify you. One does not need to check the app every time.

Geofencing

Defining the boundaries and other fencing factors on the geographical module and map in your application. We have a feature of advanced geofencing for web and apps.

Communication Tools

We have embedded solutions for all types of sports and fitness software, sports website development. Hire our sports app developers today.

Event eTicket

Is it a hassle to keep your ticket safe? well get an e-ticket to every sports show and enjoy it freely. We have even an e-ticket option for all the devices.

Live Streaming

The most trending option to engage the viewers in the LIVE option. With more new phases, we come up with the same feature for your sports app and web solutions.

Live Scoring, News

If it’s a sports app, then it must show the accurate result of the score and other news. Our team plans our best for your sports website or application.

Fantasy Leagues Management

What if your app has plenty of leagues going on? We got all to cover it. A proper structure planned by our Sport developers to manage the app in a better way.

Social Integration

Won the league or wanna share the activity with friends? Share your sports app news and updates with your friends on all social media platforms.

Activity Tracking

Your app may need some add on such as data to track your activity on sports app or sports website. Well, our developers map out the tremendous activity tracking module.

Scheduling

Any post or event you want to schedule for the future. Or any reminder to schedule the creatives. Get informed or pre-schedule it to save your time.

GPS

GPS in the app used to see nearby friends, find the nearby users’ location, getting to the location, and other nearest matches for the league. We’ve got all for you.

Biometrics

Access your app only with your unique password, sensors such as voice, patterns, fingerprints, code number, unique name, etc.

eSports App Solution

eSports has been a tremendous part of gamers around the world. In a short period, it has fascinated a large crowd towards it. Multiple players can take part in the game while sitting in any corner of the world. From appealing graphical feature to highly advanced technology, gamers demand all of it, and sports apps are on the top list. Our sports betting app developers and other sports app developers are well trained to make such an eSports application fro you. Your idea and our creative creation, a perfect esport app development combination.

Features-
  • Esports betting software
  • Esports production tools
  • Esports tournament management software
  • Esports team management software
  • Esports league management software

Fantasy Sport App Development Solutions

Fantasy apps are in boom these days. Young generations have always been an enthusiastic and energetic view of sports. when sports can make people earn, then it is cherry on the cake. Our fantasy sports app developers not only created multiple player fantasy app but also added advancement in it, so that people can play it with ease and take the most benefit from it. For all types of sports, we have various app modules available.

Features-
  • Fantasy Baseball app Development
  • Fantasy Sports Betting App Development
  • Fantasy Football League Software
  • Fantasy Cricket App Development
  • Fantasy Soccer App Development
  • Fantasy Kabaddi App Development

Why Should You Build Sports Booking App India?

There are several users that hire The NineHertz for Sports Booking app and other sports related apps/software.

Reduce Unnecessary Expense

When you hire an in-house team, you are bound to pay them monthly even if there’s no project. In our case, pay only for those sports projects you assign to us. Like this, you are spending your valuable money wisely. Work smartly with us and save the unnecessary expense.

Save up to the Max Cost

The cost of hiring sports game developers from India is much more affordable than hiring developers from other countries. The Indian sports app developers are experienced and dedicated. They are ready to work at affordable prices. Hire sports software developers from India at an average cost to save the money up to 60%.

Why Hire Sports App Developers From The NineHertz?

1

Error-free coding

Our certified sports app developers are experts in their respective fields for many years. This means it reduces the chance of mistakes in the code.

2

Agile methodology

We follow an agile methodology which reduces the development time and makes and decreases the time to market with on-time delivery.

3

Quick and easy communication

You can communicate with our offshore sports software developers from India over any platform you want such as skype, chat, call, mails, etc.

4

Complete cover to payment

In case the project does not meet the requirements raised by you. Then we will provide you a complete refund and do not charge anything.

5

Choose your team

From hiring sports betting app developers to fantasy sports developers, you are free to choose any developer according to your requirements. One can change the developer in the middle of the project.

6

Extraordinary solutions

Hire sports app programmers online and let our developers build-out of the box sports solutions for your business which is appreciated by each user of yours.
